caller_intent: Cody is seeking to resolve an issue where a payment was not processed due to an account closure error, requiring updated banking details (First Horizon Bank routing/account numbers) to reinstate a policy and set up EFT. He also needs confirmation to send a loan form to Jennifer at the company.
resolution_steps: Cynthia confirms receipt of Cody's voicemail and email.
Cody provides First Horizon Bank routing number (067011760) and account number (101880302067).
Cody states he will contact the company to make the payment and reinstate the policy using the provided details.
Cody requests Cynthia to send a loan form to Jennifer at the company to confirm the policy is active.
Cynthia agrees to send the loan form to Jennifer and inform the company.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance policy reinstatement processes
Handling payment errors related to banking details
Internal document routing (loan forms to Jennifer)
summary: Cody resolves a payment issue by providing updated banking details for First Horizon Bank to reinstate a policy and set up EFT. He coordinates with Cynthia to send a loan form to Jennifer at the company to confirm the policy is active. The call concludes with Cynthia agreeing to send the necessary documents.
